column4: Excuse me, but I have either (A. Found a bug in Dapper) or (B. Am a complete idiot)... When I use the remote desktop tool after changing my default resolution from 1024x768 to 1600x1200 and re-run the remote desktop tool. The vncserver still uses a resolution of 1024x768, and I can not remotely access all of my screen. 1. How can I fix this. 2. If it IS a bug, how do I report it?
not how to fix your bog, but http://bugs.ubuntu.com
file a new bug, and give a link to #19284 in your explanation
if in doubt, file - it can always be marked as a duplicate later
